%pyspark ###################################################################### # Starting Point: SparkSession # ################################################## # imports from pyspark.sql import SparkSession from pandas import pandas as pd from datetime import datetime import calendar from datetime import timedelta import re # ################################################## # set config spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("DataFrame Unibit").getOrCreate() spark.sparkContext.setLogLevel('WARN') print(spark.sparkContext.getConf().toDebugString()) ######################################################## # iterate over each json file on hdfs examples/sbb and append to Dataframe "dfALL" hadoop = spark._jvm.org.apache.hadoop fs = hadoop.fs.FileSystem conf = hadoop.conf.Configuration() #path = hadoop.fs.Path('/user/bd01/examples/unibit.ai/historicalstockprice/json') path = hadoop.fs.Path('/user/bd01/examples/sbb') paths=[] for f in fs.get(conf).listStatus(path): paths.append(str(f.getPath())) """ for x in paths: dftemp=spark.read.json(x) dfAll=dftemp.union(dftemp) """ dfAll=pd.DataFrame() for x in paths: dfAll=dfAll.append(spark.read.json(x).toPandas(),ignore_index=True) valbegin=[] for x in dfAll['published']: try: temp=x.split("T")[0] valbegin.append(datetime.strptime(temp,'%Y-%m-%d')) except: valbegin.append(str(x)) valend=[] for x in dfAll['validityend']: try: temp=x.split("T")[0] valend.append(datetime.strptime(temp,'%Y-%m-%d')) except: valend.append(str(x)) #trennt titel nach titel und linie, weil im titel die betroffene linie vermerkt ist title=[] line=[] for x in dfAll['title']: try: if ": " in x: title.append(x.split(": ")[0]) line.append(x.split(": ")[1]) elif ":" in x: title.append(x.split(":")[0]) line.append(x.split(":")[1]) except: title.append(str(x)) #nimmt description html und trennt sie nach den verschiedenen mustern deschtml=[] for x in dfAll['description_html']: try: if "Due" in x: temp = x.split("Due: ")[1] temp = (temp.split("
")[0]).replace("
", " ") temp = str(temp).lower() temp = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z ]+', '',temp) deschtml.append(temp) elif "Reason" in x: temp = x.split("Reason: ")[1] temp = (temp.split("
")[0]).replace("
", " ") temp = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z ]+', '',temp) temp = str(temp).lower() deschtml.append(temp) else: try: temp = (x.split("

")[1]).replace("
", " ") temp = str(temp).lower() temp = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z ]+', '',temp) deschtml.append(temp) except: temp=(x.split("

")[1]).replace("
", " ") temp = str(temp).lower() temp = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z ]+', '',temp) deschtml.append(temp) except: x.replace("
", " ") temp = str(x).lower() temp = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z ]+', '',temp) deschtml.append(temp) #wochentage herausfinden beginday=[] for x in valbegin: try: beginday.append(calendar.day_name[x.weekday()]) except: beginday.append(x) endday=[] for x in valend: try: endday.append(calendar.day_name[x.weekday()]) except: endday.append(x) dauer=[] for (x1,x2) in zip(valend,valbegin): try: diff = x1-x2 diff = diff.days diff=int(diff) if diff>0: dauer.append(diff) else: dauer.append(0) except: dauer.append(0) list_of_tuples = list(zip(valbegin,beginday,valend,endday,dauer,title,line,deschtml)) df1 = pd.DataFrame(list_of_tuples, columns = ['begin_date','begin_day','end_date','end_day','dauer','title','line','reason']) dfsq = spark.createDataFrame(df1) dfsq.createOrReplaceTempView("stoerungen")

%sql

--wie lange dauert es bis stoerungen behoben sind

select count(*) as anzahl, dauer from stoerungen
where dauer > 100
group by dauer
order by dauer desc

%sql

--an welchen wochentagen treten die meisten störungen auf

select count(*) as anzahl_meldungen, begin_day from stoerungen
group by begin_day
order by anzahl_meldungen desc

paragraphs.text:
%sql

--wie viele störungen pro woche


select count(*) as anzahl, weekofyear(begin_date) as kw, year(begin_date) as jahr from stoerungen
group by jahr,kw
order by jahr desc, kw desc

%sql


--wo hat es am meisten störungen

select count(*) as anzahl, split(line,'-')[0] as ort from stoerungen
group by ort
having anzahl > 20
order by anzahl desc

group by reason
having anzahl > 100
order by anzahl desc
